title: GV4L3: Data Science Applications in Politics and Policy
text:
Welcome to the course website for GV4L3: Data Science Applications in Politics and Policy for WT 2026. This website and the associated github repo will be the primary location for all course materials.
The Leganto reading list can be found here.
The Moodle page can be found here. Please consult Moodle for lecture recordings, and to submit any assignments (formative and summative).
Office Hours: Please sign up via studenthub.
MSc Administration: Office CBG 3.20. Opening Hours: 10:00-12:30 and 13:30-16:00. Email: gov.msc@lse.ac.uk
Lectures and Seminars: Lectures and seminars will take place as shown on the timetable.
Course Convenor (AY 25/26): Melissa Sands.
